Date: {{ doc.posting_date.strftime('%B %d, %Y') }}
{% if doc.due_date %} Due Date: {{ doc.due_date.strftime('%B %d, %Y') }}
{% endif %}

Item Qty Rate Amount
{{ item.item_name or item.item_code }}
{{ item.description or '' }} 		{{ "%.2f"|format(item.qty) }} {{ "%.2f"|format(item.rate) }} {{ "%.2f"|format(item.amount) }}
{% for tax in doc.taxes %} {% endfor %}
Subtotal: {{ "%.2f"|format(doc.net_total) }}
{{ tax.description }}: {{ "%.2f"|format(tax.tax_amount) }}
Total: {{ "%.2f"|format(doc.grand_total) }}

Thank you for your business!
